706475f-a.title: Brooklyn: Richards Street - Visitation Place
706475f-a.text:
(1)
Richard's Street, west side, north from Visitation Place, showing
the (R.C.) Church of ths Visitation.
June 25, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, as seen from Red Hook Wark.
June 25, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
706475f-a.folder: Richards Street & Visitation Place, Brooklyn, NY
